title: Kyattou Ninden Teyandee
original_name: キャッ党 忍伝 てやんでえ
sinopse: Plot of the Kyattō Ninden Teyandee manga is the continuation of the anime series. The new plan of Ko'on-no-Kami to overthrow the Shogun is in action, Karamaru gets kidnapped, Wanko-no-Kami and Nyanki get fired from their position and everything goes wrong. What happens then - find out in this manga.
